Sentence: Most of our measurements were made in a background field of 7 T, at which the T c of Bi-2212 is around 21-28 K.

Therefore the low speed at self- field for Bi-2212 is readily explained by the large temperature margin (the T c of Bi-2212 at self-field is 82 K and, given the strong influence of the magnetic field on the T c of Bi-2212, applying magnetic fields should increase the normal zone propagation velocity significantly.
